Name: Espinosa's Coup
Details: In 3022 the death of High Lord Tamati Arano triggered a coup led by House Espinosa during the coronation day of Tamati's heir, Lady Kamea Arano, who then fled into exile to the Deep Periphery. Following the successful coup, Santiago Espinosa replaced the Aurigan Coalition with the Directorate, which eventually led to the start of the Aurigan Civil War.
